items.title: Trump urges Turkey to stop buying Russian oil as Erdogan chases deal on F-35s
items.description: The US president suggests the US could lift sanctions on Turkey and allow it to buy F-35 jets.

items.title: Palestinian president says ready to work with Trump for two-state peace plan
items.description: In a speech to the UN, Mahmoud Abbas also calls on more countries to recognise a Palestinian state.

items.title: Greece extradites oligarch to Moldova in $1bn fraud case
items.description: Vladimir Plahotniuc, an oligarch and former senior Moldovan politician, denies any wrongdoing.

items.title: Over 1,000 children fall ill from free school lunches in Indonesia
items.description: The government's multi-billion-dollar "nutritious meals programme" has been plagued by food poisoning.

items.title: South Korea legalises tattooing by non-medical professionals
items.description: Many tattoo artists have operated illegally for the past 30 years, leaving them at the sharp end of the law.
